@usedefault
h1. Access Management


{{html:
<form ng-submit="addUser()"  ng-controller="AccountAccessManagementController">
    <table class="table users-table">
        <tr class="header">
            <th class="username-text-container">
                <input type="text" placeholder="Username or email address" class="username-text" ng-model="newUser.nameOrEmail">
            </th>
            <th><input type="submit" class="btn" value="Add"></input></th>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td colspan=2 ng-cloak ng-show="userError">
                <div class="alert alert-error">
                    This user cannot be added
                </div>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr ng-cloak ng-repeat="user in currentAccount.acl">
            <td>{[user.userGroupId]}</td>
            <td><a href="#" ng-click="deleteUser(currentAccount, user)" class="icon-remove-sign"></a></td>
        </tr>
    </table>
</form>

    <script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/AccountAccessManagementController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
}}
